import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CommentList from './CommentList' import FormComment from './FormComment'; import postStyle from '../styles/post.css' // Parameter: // comments: array object export default function Post({ _id, sender, content, creationTime, emoji, comments }) { const [user, setUser] = useState("") const [existImage, setExistImage] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const user = (JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth"))).user setUser(user) if (content.image !== "") { setExistImage(true) } }, []) return ( <>
{/* LEFT */}

{sender.firstName + " " + sender.lastName}

{creationTime}

{/* RIGHT */}
  • {/* MORE OPTIONS */}
    • deleteDelete This Post

{content.text}

{/* Emoji */}
Heart
Comment
Share
{/* Form Comment */} {/* Group Comment */}
) }
